thread.title: Watch: Devin Townsend's PA Dies Mid-Show, Devy Handles It Like A Champ [News]
thread.title_full: Watch: Devin Townsend's PA Dies Mid-Show, Devy Handles It Like A Champ [News]

title: Watch: Devin Townsend's PA Dies Mid-Show, Devy Handles It Like A Champ [News]
text:
Posted 11 hours ago 12 
During Devin Townsend's recent stop in Glasgow, the PA broke down for about 10 minutes, putting Mr. Devy in a rather awkward situation. 
However, the man took it all in his stride and actually delivered quite an entertaining little segment before the PA got back on track. This included a crowd rendition of " Lucky Animals ," some acoustic parts, some goofing around, the greatest pirate joke of all time, and more. 
You can check it all out in the embedded player below.
